attributes.action: DONT LET NI STEAL OUR BREXIT
attributes.background: THE IRISH BACKSTOP IS BLOCKING OUR BREXIT. GIVE NI A REFERENDUM ON UNIFICATION, THEY VOTED TO REMAIN SO MAKE THEM DECIDE EU AS ONE COUNTRY OR PART OF GREAT BRITAIN AND FREE. WE DONT NEED NI TO BE A GREAT COUNTRY AGAIN.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about leaving the EU, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to sign and share this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235185
